name: Yubarev Pistol
description:
Manufacturer: Lightning Bolt Co. 
Item Type: Pistol
Class: Electron
Magazine Size: 10
Rate Of Fire: 350 rpm
Effective Range: 35m
Attachments: Optics (S1), Underbarrel (S1)
Engineering excellence only scratches the surface of the distinct Yubarev pistol. Former merc turned weapon manufacturing mogul Irina Arkadova oversaw every aspect of the weapon, imbuing it with power, practicality, and panache. Featuring a classic woodgrain grip and cutting edge barrel design, the Yubarev fires a charged electron shot that impacts not only your target, amplifying the charge with each hit, but can spread to additional conductive targets in range.
description_cn:
制造商：雷击公司
物品类型：手枪
类别：电浆弹
弹匣容量：10
射速：350 rpm
有效射程：35米
可搭载附件：光学元件 (S1)，下挂 (S1)
卓越的工程设计仅触及了这把"尤巴列夫"手枪与众不同的冰山一角。前雇佣兵出身的武器制造业大亨伊莲娜·阿尔卡狄亲自参与并监督了该武器的设计，赋予其兼具力量，耐用，和华丽于一体的特点。"尤巴列夫"有着经典的木纹握柄和刀刃状的枪管设计，其发射的电浆弹丸每次击中目标时都会增幅电荷，并扩散伤害至射程范围内其他导电目标。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-FPSWeaponsArmor
